title: Evercore ISI Autotech & AI Forum
description: Disruptive Technology Allows Us to Leverage Foundational Strengths to Build New Capabilities – Enriching Customer Experiences and Deepening Loyalty

title: Merchants Fleet Expands BrightDrop EV Order to 18,000 with Addition of EV410s
description: BrightDrop the technology startup helping decarbonize last-mile deliveries today announced that Merchants Fleet the nation’s fastest growing fleet management company plans to expand its purchase order to 18000 BrightDrop electric vehicles with the addition of 5400 EV410s – the recently unveiled mid-size electric light commercial vehicle (eLCV).

title: Tesla details $1 bln costs for new Texas factory, targets year-end completion
description: Tesla Inc is planning to spend more than $1 billion on its new vehicle factory in Austin, Texas, and plans to complete construction by the end of this year, public filings with a Texas state agency showed.

title: PACCAR Investor Conference
description: PACCAR will hold meetings with financial analysts and institutional shareholders commencing at 8:00 a.m. Central European time on May 23, 2018, and concluding at 2:30 p.m.

title: MORGAN STANLEY VIRTUAL 9TH ANNUAL LAGUNA CONFERENCE
description: MORGAN STANLEY VIRTUAL 9TH ANNUAL LAGUNA CONFERENCE.

title: Q2 2021 EARNINGS PRESENTATION
description: Q2 revenue increased 12% to $2.2 billion reflecting higher sales in all manufacturing segments

title: WE INVEST IN APPRENTICES” – AND INVESTORS IN PEOPLE AGREE
description: Bentley becomes the first automotive company to be accredited by the Investors in People “We invest in apprentices” programme

title: BRANTLEY GILBERT
description: Brantley Gilbert’s concert with special guest Tyler Braden at Toyota Arena has been rescheduled to December 2, 2021. Your tickets will be honored for the rescheduled date.

title: Nissan e.dams concludes successful pre-season test in Valencia
description: The Nissan e.dams Formula E team completed the official ABB FIA Formula E World Championship pre-season test today, marking the start of its fourth campaign in the all-electric series.

title: The BMW Group at IAA Mobility 2021
description: The IAA will be held for the first time in Munich from September 7 through 12. The BMW Group will be present at the IAA SUMMIT with its theme of “RE:IMAGINE TODAY” at the IAA OPEN SPACE and at the BMW Group sites.
